name: Skull Rogue
description:
Skull Rogue is an RPG in the classic rogue-like style. You have to pump your ordinary skeleton to an incredible level from scratch. Discover the world of eternal battles and endless leveling of the character. The further you advance, the harder and more unique your enemies become.
Features:
- A wide variety of weapons and uniforms.
- 6 biomes with randomly generated levels.
- Unlimited pumping of the character in any direction.
- System for capturing any item from the hands of the enemy.
- Nice pixel graphics.
